amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the commercial sale of uranium by the United States until 2009 with the exception of sales required pursuant to statute.
amendment.purpose: Part B amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 107-178 to establish a framework for the disposition by the U.S. Government of excess government uranium stockpiles, in a manner that will not disrupt the commercial uranium market nor adversely affect the U.S./Russia High Enriched Uranium Agreement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wilson amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
